member.name: IWICImagingFactory.CreateBitmap
member.summary: Creates an object.
member.param: The width of the new bitmap .
The height of the new bitmap.
The pixel format of the new bitmap.

param.name: option
param.para: The cache creation options of the new bitmap. This can be one of the values in the enumeration.

listheader.description: Allocates system memory for the bitmap at initialization.
Allocates system memory for the bitmap when the bitmap is first used.
This option is not valid for this method and should not be used.

member.param: A pointer that receives a pointer to the new bitmap.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICImagingFactory.CreateBitmapFromMemory
member.summary: Creates an from a memory block.

The height of the new bitmap.
The pixel format of the new bitmap. For valid pixel formats, see Native Pixel Formats.
The number of bytes between successive scanlines in pbBuffer.
The size of pbBuffer.
The buffer used to create the bitmap.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICImagingFactory.CreateBitmapFromSource
member.summary: Creates a from a .
member.param: The to create the bitmap from.

param.name: option
param.para: The cache options of the new bitmap. This can be one of the values in the enumeration.

listheader.description: Do not create a system memory copy. Share the bitmap with the source.
Create a system memory copy when the bitmap is first used.
Create a system memory copy when this method is called.

member.param: A pointer that receives a pointer to the new bitmap.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICImagingFactory.CreateDecoder

param.para: The GUID for the desired container format.

param.name: pguidVendor
param.para: The GUID for the preferred encoder vendor.

listheader.description: Prefer to use the native Microsoft encoder.

member.param: A pointer that receives a pointer to a new . You must initialize this IWICBitmapDecoder on a stream using the method later.

member.name: IWICImagingFactory
member.summary: Exposes methods used to create components for the Windows Imaging Component (WIC) such as decoders, encoders and pixel format converters.
